entry.title: Tuesday: Rain. High plus 2.
entry.summary: Becoming cloudy this afternoon then rain. Risk of freezing rain this afternoon. Wind southeast 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming southwest 20 gusting to 40 this afternoon. High plus 2. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 1:39 PM EST Tuesday 07 February 2023
